description: Adaptive Framework configuration component for type=requestHandler handlerType=adapter.

adapterId.brief: If specified, this adapterId is prepended to the path
adapterId.description: If this property is specified, a '/' followed by adapterId is prepended to the path passed to process request if it does not already have that prefix.
adapterId.label: Adapter

objectType.brief: If specified, this objectType is prepended to the path
objectType.description: If this property is specified, a '/' followed by adapterId followed by a '/' followed by objectType is prepended to the path passed to process request if it does not already have that prefix. If this property is specified, adapterId is required.
objectType.label: Object Type

defaultOptions.brief: Default object options for method GET requests through this request handler
defaultOptions.description: This is the default object options for method GET requests though this request handler.
defaultOptions.label: Default Options
